title.rendered: INTECH brings its process automation, cybersecurity, digitalization portfolios to MEICA 2023

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH’s global experts from its process automation, industrial cybersecurity, and digitalization portfolios will gather in the Grand Hyatt, Al Khobar for the 4th edition of MEICA, Middle East’s largest instrumentation, automation, and cybersecurity conference.

From September 12 through September 14, our experts will be welcoming you at stall B4 and B5 to discuss latest developments, insights, challenges, and opportunities impacting the large-scale industry: oil & gas, petrochemicals, manufacturing, and utilities, in particular. We are excited to share how our solutions and expertise have been helping organizations like yours in navigating these challenges, optimizing processes, and driving sustainable outcomes.

About MEICA 2023

MEICA’s 4th Edition is scheduled to take place on 12th – 14th September 2023 Grand Hyatt, Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia to show itself as an ideal location for the world of business and trade in Middle East, assembling key service providers and engineers involved in equipment design, standards, maintenance and reliability, cybersecurity and asset integrity practices that evolves around the instrumentation control and automation equipment prodigy of heavy industries in GCC and providing an all- new perspective on the technology and engineering expertise necessary to power a sustainable outcome for the industry.

Find out more here: https://meicamiddleeast.com/about/

About INTECH

INTECH Automation & Intelligence is a globally renowned industrial automation & digitalization technology company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies resolve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As part of our promise of helping businesses evolve in the Industry 4.0 era, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
